message: Hi Bob, I propose we split the $100 so that I receive $55 and you receive $45. Since any delay reduces my share's actual value by 5% per round, I believe it's in both our interests to settle quickly. Looking forward to your thoughts!
Alice, I understand your perspective on the decreasing value. How about we turn the tables? You get $45, and I'll take $55. It's a fair counter-offer considering the time pressure.

Hi Bob, thanks for the counter-offer. While I understand your position regarding the time pressure, I must also consider that each extra round reduces my share's value by 5%. Considering this, I believe it's best for both of us to finalize the deal now. I accept your offer of $45 for me and $55 for you.
